price: Não saberá Ele a quem criou? E Ele é O Sutil, O Conhecedor.
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
